text: @realDonaldTrump @nytimes @SecAzar Oh shut up. You know you messed up. Thousands died because you believed the Coronavirus was a DEMOCRATIC HOAX packed your bags and went to Mar La Go to play and left us to DIE. So stop trying to put BLAME on OTHERS. It's your FAULT. BLAME BLAME BLAME!
